Improvements.Description: Calling intValue() on an Integer object is redundant and unnecessary. The primitive int value can be directly obtained from the Integer object through auto-unboxing.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- if ((INLINE.equals(display) || StringUtils.isEmpty(styleWidth)) && parent instanceof HtmlElement) {
+ if ((INLINE.equals(display) || StringUtils.isBlank(styleWidth)) && parent instanceof HtmlElement) {
Improvements.Description: StringUtils.isBlank checks for both null, empty and whitespace only strings, providing a more comprehensive check compared to StringUtils.isEmpty.
The BrowserVersion object is used multiple times in the code. Extracting this into a variable at the start of the method will reduce redundancy and improve readability.
